mapper.insert:
insert into damage_repository_position
damage_repository_position.bridge_tunnel,
damage_repository_position.damage_position,
damage_repository_position.direction,
damage_repository_position.hole_position,
damage_repository_position.line_category,
damage_repository_position.line_id,
damage_repository_position.line_name,
damage_repository_position.miles,
damage_repository_position.station_id,
damage_repository_position.stock_exchange,
damage_repository_position.thigh_track_id,
damage_repository_position.create_time
values
#{bridgeTunnel},
#{damagePosition},
#{direction},
#{holePosition},
#{lineCategory},
#{lineId},
#{lineName},
#{miles},
#{stationId},
#{stockExchange},
#{thighTrackId},
current_timestamp
mapper.update:
update damage_repository_position
damage_repository_position.bridge_tunnel = #{BridgeTunnel},
damage_repository_position.damage_position = #{DamagePosition},
damage_repository_position.direction = #{Direction},
damage_repository_position.hole_position = #{HolePosition},
damage_repository_position.line_category = #{LineCategory},
damage_repository_position.line_id = #{LineId},
damage_repository_position.line_name = #{LineName},
damage_repository_position.miles = #{Miles},
damage_repository_position.station_id = #{StationId},
damage_repository_position.stock_exchange = #{StockExchange},
damage_repository_position.thigh_track_id = #{ThighTrackId}
damage_repository_position.update_time= current_timestamp
damage_repository_position.order_detail_id = #{orderDetailId}
mapper.select:
select damage_repository_position.bridge_tunnel, damage_repository_position.create_time, damage_repository_position.damage_position, damage_repository_position.direction, damage_repository_position.hole_position, damage_repository_position.line_category, damage_repository_position.line_id, damage_repository_position.line_name, damage_repository_position.miles, damage_repository_position.order_detail_id, damage_repository_position.station_id, damage_repository_position.stock_exchange, damage_repository_position.thigh_track_id, damage_repository_position.update_time form damage_repository_position
damage_repository_position.order_detail_id = #{orderDetailId}
